alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 16 at 6:04AM MST until March 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Elevated flow and flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of central Arizona, including the lower elevations of Yavapai County and northern Gila County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Elevated flow and flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could experience flooding, which would create deadly travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Prior rainfall and snowmelt will combine to create significant flows in area waterways, with the potential for flooding in some areas. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
